title: Can anyone write a poem on ''him''? - Quora

response.answer_text: In days gone by, it was different then It was jobs for the girls, and jobs for the men. The women's work was household chores and men, they'd work the factory floors The hours were long, the pay was small But they somehow managed after all Strangely, though he worked away And she'd be in the house all day She'd tell her friends as she scrubbed the floors I really miss him, - him indoors.
